PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09272011-09-22,  HC,  ,  , 
ActTobacco Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Tobacco Products Information Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TOBACCO PRODUCTS INFORMATION REGULATIONS, in order to remove the application of the Tobacco Products Information Regulations to cigarettes and little cigars, respond to the problems identified by the Standing Joint Committee on Scrutiny of Regulations, and remove the obligation to list numerical values for toxic emissions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0179 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
